thread.title: 2014/15 GFA /PLB Awards Night to be held on October 30
thread.title_full: 2014/15 GFA /PLB Awards Night to be held on October 30

title: 2014/15 GFA /PLB Awards Night to be held on October 30
text:
19:42 CET 2014/15 GFA /PLB Awards Night to be held on October 30 By Ghana FA 
The Ghana Football Association and the Premier League Board announces with pleasure that the 2014/15 First Capital Plus Premier League Awards Event will be held at the La Palm Royal Beach Hotel on Friday, October 30, 2015 at 6.00pm. 
The Awards ceremony is to celebrate players, clubs and officials who distinguished themselves in the 2014/15 First Capital Plus Premier League season. 
Organisers of the Premier League will provide further details concerning the Awards event to the general public in due time. Sports News Follow Us Good men don't live long,so live up to your God given talent and exploit it with wisdom. By: Agboloso(London).
